title: Amazon shootout with Brazil police leaves 17 dead
text:
Security officials say police in Brazil's Amazonas state have shot and killed 17 members of a group of suspected drug traffickers. No police were injured in the firefight.

Interested in Brazil? Add Brazil as an interest to stay up to date on the latest Brazil news, video, and analysis from ABC News. Add Interest

Police say they intercepted the traffickers in the state capital of Manaus Wednesday as they prepared to murder rivals.

Military police commander-general Ayrton Norte says officers "carried out a surgical, precise operation and removed 17 criminals from the streets of Manaus."
